title: Pause custom domain and Google Search Console verification work while continuing app updates
constraints: Do not implement or modify any custom domain (yfo.org) connection flow, DNS instructions, or related deployment steps in this build.
Do not implement or modify any Google Search Console verification work (meta-tag verification, verification scripts, or related production promotion steps) in this build.
Use English for any user-facing text in any changes that are made.
nonGoals: Buying or configuring any domain name (including yfo.org).
Completing Google Search Console verification by HTML meta tag or DNS TXT method.
Updating production deployment documentation related to domain setup or Google Search Console verification.
